summary: Brooklyn, 1985. With the mob world as a backdrop, three life-long friends struggle with questions of love, loss and loyalty.
cast: Paulo Araujo|Daniel Tay|Ty Thomas Reed|Brian O'Neill|Alec Baldwin|Scott Caan|Jerry Ferrara|Freddie Prinze Jr.|Mena Suvari|Alexa Havins|Christian Maelen|Chris Caldovino|John Cenatiempo|Staci Rudnitsky|Annie Golden|Monica Keena|Tibor Feldman|Dan McCabe|P.J. Brown|Marc Alan Austen|Rome Kanda|Robert Turano|Phyllis Kay|Lin Tucci|Kevin Thoms|James Thompson|Richard Perello|Anthony Paolucci|Ursula Abbott|Anthony Vincent|Frank Lapetina|Bern Cohen|Ed Rubeo|Elyse Seiden|Frank Ferrara|Jeffrey M. Marchetti|Larry Nuñez|Jacqueline Lovell|Karla Cavalli|Anthony Ferriso|John Heinlein|Jessica Jennings|Anna Kendrick|Stefanie Marco|Lisa Maris|Nicholas E. Pagani|Kevin Paul|Alison Raimondi|Vincent James Russo|Benny Salerno|Keri Uribe|Anne Yeomans
title: La ley de Brooklyn
